comment._content: Lionel Robbins (1898-1984): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lionel_Robbins,_Baron_Robbins www.lse.ac.uk/resources/LSEHistory/robbins.htm Huw Wheldon (1916-1986): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Huw_Wheldon Ralf Dahrendorf (1929-2009): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dahrendorf Baron Dahrendorf and Lionel Robbins's son Richard Robbins both died this year (2009): www.guardian.co.uk/artanddesign/2009/oct/11/art-poetry
